location.description: Filter by city name (e.g., London, Paris, New York)

toolDefinition.name: getAccommodations
toolDefinition.description: Retrieves a list of available accommodations. Optionally filter by location.

pages.name: OpenAPI
pages.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Hotel Booking API (Secured)
  version: "1.0"
  description: Secured version of the Hotel Booking API with OAuth2 authentication
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:8082/hotels
tags:
  - name: Accommodations
    description: Browse available accommodations
  - name: Bookings
    description: Manage hotel bookings

paths:
  /accommodations:
    get:
      tags: [Accommodations]
      summary: Retrieves a list of available accommodations. Optionally filter by location.
      operationId: getAccommodations
      parameters:
        - name: location
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          description: Filter by city name (e.g., London, Paris, New York)
      responses:
        "200":
          description: List of accommodations
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/Accommodation"

  /bookings:
    get:
      tags: [Bookings]
      summary: Retrieves all existing bookings.
      operationId: getBookings
      security:
        - oauth2: [read:bookings]
        - bearerAuth: []
      responses:
        "200":
          description: List of bookings for a specific user
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/Booking"
        "401":
          description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  error:
                    type: string
                    example: "Unauthorized"
                  message:
                    type: string
                    example: "Valid authentication token is required"
        "403":
          description: Forbidden - Insufficient permissions
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  error:
                    type: string
                    example: "Forbidden"
                  message:
                    type: string
                    example: "Insufficient permissions to access this resource"

components:
  securitySchemes:
    oauth2:
      type: oauth2
      description: OAuth2 authentication with authorization code flow
      flows:
        authorizationCode:
          authorizationUrl: http://localhost:8092/gravitee/oauth/authorize
          tokenUrl: http://localhost:8092/gravitee/oauth/token
          scopes:
            read:bookings: Read access to booking information
            write:bookings: Write access to create or modify bookings
        clientCredentials:
          tokenUrl: http://localhost:8092/gravitee/oauth/token
          scopes:
            read:bookings: Read access to booking information
            write:bookings: Write access to create or modify bookings
    bearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT
      description: JWT Bearer token authentication

  schemas:
    Accommodation:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          example: 1
        name:
          type: string
          example: The Grand Hotel London
        location:
          type: string
          example: London
        description:
          type: string
          example: Luxury 5-star hotel in central London with exceptional service
        price_per_night:
          type: number
          format: float
          example: 350.0
        available_rooms:
          type: integer
          example: 15
      required:
        - id
        - name
        - location
        - description
        - price_per_night
        - available_rooms

    Booking:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          example: 1
        user_email:
          type: string
          format: email
          description: Email address of the booking owner
          example: john.doe@gravitee.io
        hotel_name:
          type: string
          example: The Grand Hotel London
        room_number:
          type: string
          example: "305"
        start_date:
          type: string
          format: date-time
          example: "2025-10-17T14:00:00"
        end_date:
          type: string
          format: date-time
          example: "2025-10-24T11:00:00"
        price:
          type: number
          format: float
          example: 2450.0
      required:
        - id
        - user_email
        - hotel_name
        - room_number
        - start_date
        - end_date
        - price

pages.name: Homepage
pages.content:
# üè® Hotel Booking API

The **Hotel Booking API** provides a modern, secure interface for discovering hotel accommodations and managing bookings.  
It is designed for partners, agencies, and internal applications that require authenticated access to booking data.

---

## üåê Overview

This API enables seamless integration with hotel reservation systems.  
It supports both **public data retrieval** (accommodation browsing) and **protected operations** (booking management).

Authentication is enforced via **OAuth2** or **JWT Bearer tokens**, ensuring sensitive information such as booking details remains secure.

---

## üîê Authentication

The API uses standard authentication mechanisms for maximum flexibility and security.

### OAuth2 Authentication
Supports both the **Authorization Code** and **Client Credentials** flows for delegated and machine-to-machine access.

**Endpoints:**
- Authorization URL: `https://auth.example.com/oauth/authorize`
- Token URL: `https://auth.example.com/oauth/token`

**Scopes:**
- `read:bookings` ‚Äì Read access to booking data  
- `write:bookings` ‚Äì Create or modify bookings

### Bearer Token (JWT)
Applications can also use JWT Bearer tokens for quick access.

Header example:
```
Authorization: Bearer <your_jwt_token>
```

---

## üí° Key Features

- üîé **Browse Accommodations:** Search for available hotels by location.  
- üõéÔ∏è **Manage Bookings:** View or manage confirmed reservations (requires authentication).  
- üß≠ **Flexible Security:** Compatible with OAuth2 and JWT-based authentication.  
- üí¨ **Rich Metadata:** Each accommodation includes detailed descriptions, pricing, and room availability.  
- ‚öôÔ∏è **Standardized Model:** Follows OpenAPI 3.0.3 specifications for easy integration.  

---

## üì¶ Data Models

### Accommodation
Describes a hotel listing, including pricing and availability.

| Field | Type | Description |
|--------|------|-------------|
| `id` | integer | Unique accommodation identifier |
| `name` | string | Name of the hotel |
| `location` | string | City or region where the hotel is located |
| `description` | string | Hotel summary or key features |
| `price_per_night` | number | Price per night (in USD) |
| `available_rooms` | integer | Number of available rooms |

### Booking
Represents a confirmed reservation made by an authenticated user.

| Field | Type | Description |
|--------|------|-------------|
| `id` | integer | Unique booking identifier |
| `user_email` | string | Email of the booking owner |
| `hotel_name` | string | Name of the booked hotel |
| `room_number` | string | Room number assigned |
| `start_date` | date-time | Start date/time of the stay |
| `end_date` | date-time | End date/time of the stay |
| `price` | number | Total cost of the booking |

## üìñ API Reference

The full OpenAPI specification is available in the documentation pages.

---

¬© 2025 Gravitee ‚Äì Hotel Booking API

response.name: Transform Headers
response.description: Add backend response status to an header
